Reviews.Title: Questionable?!
Reviews.Author: Movier
Reviews.Content: Went to BestBuy to check out the sale deal for the Asus X55...  Looks to be a nice student version of a laptop.. great features and style...  though after checking out the new windows 8 os, I think I will pass on the deal.. Mainly due to Windows 8 preinstalled.. I do doubt that I will upgrade or move into any computer that has Win 8..  way too far out of the working environment I operate in...  Win 8 may be another lossy diversion like Millennium and Vista was...  I will stay with computers that offer Win 7...  sad to see the direction MS is going here...  still I hope that lots of consumers go for the MS 8, makes the older MS 7 pc's cheaper for us working folks...
